name: Logic Gates (keremoner)
description:
Learn how logic gates work and create your own logic gates. 

You can learn the fundamental topic of mathematics and computer science - logic. You can understand how computers work by learning how logic gates work. You can understand the basics of the topic with educational levels and expand your knowledge with challenging puzzles. Also, you can create whatever gate you want in sandbox mod.

+Educational levels

+Puzzles

+Sandbox mod
